Title: Godzilla: City on the Edge of Battle
Writer: Gen Urobuchi (story concept), Gen Urobuchi (series composition), Sadayuki Murai (series composition), Sadayuki Murai (screenplay), Tetsuya Yamada (screenplay), Gen Urobuchi (screenplay), Ishirô Honda (character: Godzilla)
Actors: Mamoru Miyano, Takahiro Sakurai, Kana Hanazawa, Tomokazu Sugita
Plot: Humanity's desperate battle to reclaim the Earth from Godzilla continues. The key to defeating the King of the Monsters may be Mechagodzilla, a robotic weapon thought to have been lost nearly 20,000 years ago.
